SELECT DISTINCT t3.ID_ as id, t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t4.NAME_ AS formName, t2.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t4.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t2.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, t3.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t3.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t3.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, t3.END_TIME_ as endTime, t5.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,NOW(),t3.END_TIME_) as restTime, t3.GROUP_ID_ as groupId, t3.FLOW_TYPE_ as flowType, t3.FROM_KEY_ as fromKey, t3.IS_DB_ as isDb, t3.BUSINESS_INFO_ as businessInfo, '待办' as 'status' FROM act_ru_task t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_execution t2 ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ and t1.EXECUTION_ID_ = t2.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_extension_task t3 ON T1.ID_ = t3.TASK_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t4 ON T1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t4.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_task t5 ON t2.ID_ = t5.EXECUTION_ID_ WHERE t3.ID_ is not null
and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId}

SELECT DISTINCT t3.ID_ as id, t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t1.START_TIME_ AS startTime, t3.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t3.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t3.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,NOW(),t3.END_TIME_) as restTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,t1.START_TIME_,t1.END_TIME_) as duration, t3.GROUP_ID_ as groupId, t1.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.END_TIME_ as endTime, t3.FLOW_TYPE_ as flowType, case when t1.END_TIME_ is null then '待办' else '已办' end as status, case when t1.DELETE_REASON_ is null then '审批' else '驳回' end as approveType, t4.NAME_ as formName, t4.BUSINESS_KEY_ as businessKey, t3.IS_DB_ as isDb, t3.BUSINESS_INFO_ as businessInfo FROM act_hi_taskinst t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_extension_task t3 ON T1.ID_ = t3.TASK_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t2 ON t3.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t4 ON T1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t4.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId}
order by t1.END_TIME_

SELECT DISTINCT t3.ID_ as id, t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t1.START_TIME_ AS startTime, t3.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t3.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t3.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,t1.START_TIME_,t1.END_TIME_) as duration, t3.GROUP_ID_ as groupId, t1.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.END_TIME_ as endTime, t3.FLOW_TYPE_ as flowType, case when t1.END_TIME_ is null then '待办' else '已办' end as 'status', case when t1.DELETE_REASON_ is null then '审批' else '驳回' end as approveType, t4.NAME_ as formName, t4.BUSINESS_KEY_ as businessKey, t3.IS_DB_ as isDb, t3.BUSINESS_INFO_ as businessInfo FROM act_hi_taskinst t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_extension_task t3 ON T1.ID_ = t3.TASK_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t2 ON t3.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t4 ON T1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t4.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and t1.END_TIME_ is not null order by t1.END_TIME_

SELECT t1.ID_ AS id, t1.TASK_ID_ as taskId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ as processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ as startTime, t1.FROM_KEY_ as fromKey, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey
FROM act_ru_extension_task t1 WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and TASK_ID_ = #{taskId}

SELECT t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee, t1.FROM_KEY_ as fromKey, t1.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t1.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t1.FLOW_TYPE_ as flowType, t1.CREATE_TIME_ as startTime FROM act_ru_extension_task t1 WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #{taskDefinitionKey} order by CREATE_TIME_ desc limit 1
SELECT t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey FROM act_ru_extension_task t1 WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and CREATE_TIME_ = #{startTime}

select t2.TASK_DEF_KEY_ from act_ru_extension_task t2 where t2.CREATE_TIME_ = (select t1.CREATE_TIME_ from act_ru_extension_task t1 where t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and t1.TASK_ID_ = #{taskId})
